New Records: Ben Stokes scored an unbeaten 42 off 36 to help England win by 4 wickets
Key Match Events: England chased down a target of 142 against Sri Lanka with 4 wickets in hand and two balls to spare
Ben Stokes' unbeaten 42 off 36 took them through
Mark Wood's 3 for 26 helped England restrict Sri Lanka to 141 for 8
Pre-Game Insights: Dasun Shanaka won the toss and elected to bat
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler said that it was not a great watch but he knew they have to find a way and he is glad that they did it in the end
Dasun Shanaka said that it was an amazing fight but feels that they could have done better with the bat
Adil Rashid was awarded the Player of the Match for his economical bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: England avoided Sri Lanka scare to enter the semi-finals of T20 World Cup
Australia were knocked out of the tournament
The match was played at the Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG), Sydney
